statements: SELECT * FROM SoilChanges;
SELECT texture, structure FROM SoilChanges;
SELECT measurement_id, timestamp FROM SoilChanges WHERE texture = 'Loamy';
SELECT * FROM SoilChanges ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT texture FROM SoilChanges;
SELECT * FROM SoilChanges ORDER BY measurement_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT timestamp, texture FROM SoilChanges WHERE structure='Clay'
SELECT * FROM SoilChanges WHERE texture='Silty' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT measurement_id, texture FROM SoilChanges WHERE texture LIKE '%y%'
SELECT * FROM SoilChanges WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY measurement_id ASC
SELECT * FROM texture_measurements WHERE measurement_value > 50;
SELECT texture, measurement_value FROM texture_measurements WHERE texture='smooth' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT measurement_id, structure, timestamp FROM structure_measurements WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM texture_measurements;
SELECT * FROM texture_measurements JOIN structure_measurements ON texture_measurements.measurement_id = structure_measurements.measurement_id;
SELECT * FROM texture_measurements WHERE measurement_value > 50;
SELECT texture, measurement_value FROM texture_measurements ORDER BY measurement_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM structure_measurements WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT texture, COUNT(*) AS total_measurements FROM texture_measurements GROUP BY texture;
SELECT structure, AVG(measurement_value) AS avg_measurement_value FROM structure_measurements GROUP BY structure ORDER BY avg_measurement_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_measurements;
SELECT id, texture FROM soil_measurements ORDER BY texture DESC;
SELECT measurement_date, structure FROM soil_measurements WHERE texture = 'Loamy';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM measurement_locations WHERE latitude < 40;
SELECT id, note FROM measurement_notes ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM soil_measurements WHERE texture = 'Sandy';
SELECT id, texture, structure FROM soil_measurements WHERE measurement_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT m.id, m.measurement_date, m.structure, n.note FROM soil_measurements m JOIN measurement_notes n ON m.id = n.measurement_id WHERE n.note LIKE '%important%';

SELECT l.location_name, l.latitude, l.longitude, m.measurement_date FROM measurement_locations l JOIN soil_measurements m ON l.measurement_id = m.id WHERE m.texture = 'Clay' ORDER BY m.measurement_date ASC;

SELECT m.id, m.measurement_date, n.note, l.location_name FROM soil_measurements m LEFT JOIN measurement_notes n ON m.id = n.measurement_id LEFT JOIN measurement_locations l ON m.id = l.measurement_id WHERE m.id = 5;
SELECT * FROM SoilTexture;
SELECT id, texture, moisture_level FROM SoilTexture ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, moisture_level FROM SoilTexture WHERE texture='Silty Clay';
SELECT timestamp, texture FROM SoilTexture WHERE moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT id, structure_type FROM SoilStructure WHERE compaction_level < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM SoilTexture WHERE id = 1;
SELECT texture, moisture_level FROM SoilTexture WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT structure_type, compaction_level FROM SoilStructure WHERE compaction_level < 0.3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM SoilPH WHERE ph_level BETWEEN 6.0 AND 7.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, timestamp, moisture_reading FROM MoistureContent WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM SoilTexture;
SELECT timestamp, texture FROM SoilStructure WHERE measurement_id = 10;
SELECT measurement_id, timestamp, ph_level FROM SoilpH ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT component, percentage FROM SoilComposition WHERE percentage > 20;
SELECT * FROM SoilMoisture LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SoilTexture ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT measurement_id, timestamp, moisture_level FROM SoilMoisture WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT component, percentage FROM SoilComposition WHERE percentage BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY component ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT measurement_id, structure FROM SoilStructure WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY measurement_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT measurement_id, ph_level FROM SoilpH WHERE ph_level < 6.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
